Depress the battery-release button and the battery pack will disengage from the latch; grasp the battery pack and remove it from the machine; always be aware of your feet, children, or pets when pressing the button and never remove the battery pack at a high location.

Battery-status indicator glows solid orange; cool the battery pack until temperature drops below 67°C (152°F), then restart the machine.
The battery pack electronics error. Replace the battery pack or contact EGO customer service center.
The machine is overheated; release the trigger and wait until the machine cools down and the speed indicator turns green, then restart the machine.
Flashing orange speed indicator means the machine is overloaded; remove the battery pack, reattach it, restart the machine, and decrease the load.
